title: Quality Over Speed Matters: Building Stronger Connections
description:
In today's fast-paced world, it's easy to believe that being the first to the party is the key to success. But what if focusing on quality and depth could lead to even greater, long-term benefits? 
Today lets jump into the importance of ensuring the details you put out and the things you learn are top-notch. Striving to be the best rather than the first can create better structures, stronger connections, and a more abundant approach to success.

Check them out: https://engineeringgenerosity.com
